apps.name: CrowdSec
apps.description: CrowdSec is an open-source, lightweight security engine that detects and responds to malicious behaviors
apps.author: CyberMind.fr
apps.notes: Requires full OpenWrt build environment (not SDK). Go 1.23.12 available in OpenWrt 24.10.

apps.name: NoDogSplash
apps.description: Captive portal solution that intercepts HTTP traffic and serves a customizable splash page before granting network access
apps.author: CyberMind.fr

apps.name: Domoticz
apps.description: Home automation system with support for various devices and protocols
apps.author: CyberMind.fr

apps.name: Lyrion Music Server
apps.description: Multi-room audio streaming server (formerly Logitech Media Server)
apps.author: CyberMind.fr

apps.name: Zigbee2MQTT
apps.description: Zigbee to MQTT bridge allowing you to use Zigbee devices without proprietary hubs
apps.author: CyberMind.fr

apps.name: LocalAI
apps.description: Self-hosted OpenAI-compatible API for running LLMs locally with support for text, audio, and image generation
apps.author: CyberMind.fr
apps.notes: GPU acceleration optional. Model files require additional storage (1-10GB per model).

apps.name: Citadel
apps.description: Complete groupware solution with email, calendar, contacts, instant messaging, and collaboration tools
apps.author: CyberMind.fr
apps.notes: Web-based groupware with email server, calendar, contacts, and instant messaging.

apps.name: ISPConfig
apps.description: Web hosting control panel for managing multiple servers, websites, email accounts, DNS, and databases
apps.author: CyberMind.fr
apps.notes: Full hosting control panel with Apache/nginx, MySQL/MariaDB, PHP, email, DNS, and FTP.

apps.name: Mail-in-a-Box
apps.description: Easy-to-deploy email server with webmail, contacts, calendar, spam filtering, and automatic security updates
apps.author: CyberMind.fr
apps.notes: Requires a domain name with proper DNS configuration. Includes webmail, spam filtering, and automatic TLS.

apps.name: Nextcloud
apps.description: Self-hosted file sync and share platform with calendar, contacts, mail, video calls, and collaborative document editing
apps.author: CyberMind.fr
apps.notes: Dropbox alternative with apps for mobile and desktop. Supports SQLite (default) or MySQL/PostgreSQL.

apps.name: AdGuard Home
apps.description: Network-wide ad and tracker blocker with DNS-over-HTTPS/TLS support, parental controls, and detailed analytics
apps.author: CyberMind.fr
apps.notes: Pi-hole alternative with DNS-over-HTTPS/TLS. Configure router to use AdGuard Home as DNS server.

apps.name: Portainer
apps.description: Powerful Docker container management platform with web UI for managing containers, images, networks, and volumes
apps.author: CyberMind.fr
apps.notes: Manages Docker containers on the router. Access via web UI to deploy and monitor containers.

apps.name: Home Assistant
apps.description: Open-source home automation platform with support for 2000+ integrations including lights, sensors, cameras, and voice assistants
apps.author: CyberMind.fr
apps.notes: Most popular home automation platform. Supports Zigbee, Z-Wave, MQTT, and 2000+ integrations.

apps.name: Jellyfin
apps.description: Free media server for managing and streaming movies, TV shows, music, and photos with apps for all platforms
apps.author: CyberMind.fr
apps.notes: Plex alternative with no premium features. Hardware transcoding supported with GPU.

apps.name: Vaultwarden
apps.description: Lightweight Bitwarden-compatible password manager server written in Rust with web vault and mobile sync
apps.author: CyberMind.fr
apps.notes: Bitwarden-compatible server. Use with official Bitwarden apps. HTTPS strongly recommended.

apps.name: Gitea
apps.description: Lightweight self-hosted Git service with web UI, issue tracking, pull requests, and CI/CD integration
apps.author: CyberMind.fr
apps.notes: GitHub/GitLab alternative. Lightweight and fast. Supports SSH and HTTP Git access.

apps.name: Uptime Kuma
apps.description: Modern uptime monitoring tool with web UI, status pages, notifications, and multi-protocol support
apps.author: CyberMind.fr
apps.notes: Beautiful uptime monitoring. Supports HTTP, TCP, ping, DNS, and more. Push notifications.

iot.description: Internet of Things and home automation

ai.description: Artificial intelligence and machine learning tools
